# https://www.robotstxt.org/robotstxt.html
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://www.biosked.com/sitemap-index.xml

# Crawl-delay for aggressive bots
User-agent: GPTBot
Crawl-delay: 10

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Crawl-delay: 10

# Block common bad bots
User-agent: AhrefsBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: SemrushBot
Crawl-delay: 10

User-agent: DotBot
Disallow: /
